hobbies.title: 3D Printing
hobbies.description: Bringing digital designs to life, one layer at a time. Creating custom parts for DIY projects and prototyping ideas for potential startups.

hobbies.title: Hiking
hobbies.description: Exploring Estonia's beautiful forests and national parks. Using tech to track routes and discover new trails.

hobbies.title: Board Games
hobbies.description: Enjoying strategy games that challenge the mind. Favorite titles include Settlers of Catan, Ticket to Ride, Pandemic, and Warhammer 40k. Currently tackling a large grey pile of shame!

hobbies.title: Gym (Strength Training)
hobbies.description: Focusing on compound barbell lifts and functional movements. Aiming for progressive overload and better overall health.

hobbies.title: Painting
hobbies.description: Working primarily with oil paints to capture the mood and beauty of landscapes, focusing on light and color.
